lines: Nguucia harĩ we, Jesũ mwega; Tũikaranagie mahiinda mothe,
Ngwenda ũnyiite na ũũnũmie; njikarage gĩthũri-inĩ gĩaku,
Nguucia harĩ we, ndirĩ kĩĩndũ; ndirĩ indo cia gũkũrutĩra,
O’ theengia ngoro heheenjeku; ũmĩthambie na thakame yaku,
Nguucia harĩ we, nduĩke waku; Nĩngeneete nĩgũtiga meehia,
Na ĩkeno ciothe na mwĩtĩĩo; ngwenda O Jesũ ũrĩa waambirwo,
Nguucia harĩ wee, hiingo ciothe; O kinya nginye kũu igũrũ,
Ngaatũũra kuo na tene; ndĩĩroragĩre ũthiũ ũcio waku,
